title: im making a lawsuit against the forums
body:
recently ive been called "noob kid" by many users of this forum and im really offended


im hiring my father's lawyers working for his company (SG Pussy Fuckers) to help me with this case!!!!
if you would like to send anonymous tip offs for evidence on this case please send it to the number 
1-800-PUSI-FUK
